files.patch:
@@ -130,3 +130,3 @@
-When used with the create operation mode, this option changes the
-specified directory and includes the \f[I]files\f[R] specified at the
-end of the command line.
+When used with the create operation mode, changes the specified
+directory and includes the \f[I]files\f[R] specified at the end of the
+command line.
@@ -139,3 +139,2 @@
-When used with the extract operation mode, this option considers the
-specified directory as the destination directory into which the JAR file
-will be extracted.
+When used with the extract operation mode, specifies the destination
+directory where the JAR file will be extracted.
@@ -215,1 +214,1 @@
-Directory into which the jar will be extracted.
+Directory into which the JAR file will be extracted.
@@ -357,1 +356,1 @@
-Extract a JAR file \f[V]foo.jar\f[R] to \f[V]/tmp/bar/\f[R] directory:
+Extract the JAR file \f[V]foo.jar\f[R] to \f[V]/tmp/bar/\f[R] directory:
